channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s What Trump And Other Republicans Can Do To Solve America’s Housing Affordability Crisis
item.description: 'Potential home buyers would benefit greatly from a whole-of-government approach at the federal, at the state, and at the local level,' said Heritage ...

item.title: Top Democrats Are Agitating For Insurrection And Political Vigilantism
item.description: Democrats seem to think that laws and policies they don’t like can be thwarted by an angry mob or an insurrectionist governor.

item.title: U.S. broke the law with oil tanker seizure, China says
item.description: China accused the U.S. of violating international law by grabbing a merchant vessel that last docked in Venezuela and was accused of dodging U.S. sanc...

item.title: Minneapolis on edge after fatal shooting of woman by ICE officer
item.description: Minneapolis was on edge Thursday following the fatal shooting of a woman by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer taking part in the Trump ad...

item.title: ‘DEI Ruined The Business’: Acclaimed Clarinetist Sues Knoxville Symphony For Anti-White Discrimination
item.description: ‘Hopefully I'll win my lawsuit ... and orchestras will go back to hiring the best players the way they did before DEI ruined the business.’

item.title: If The Military Can Protect Law Enforcement In Venezuela, It Can Protect ICE In Minnesota
item.description: United States law enforcement arrested Venezuelan dictator Nicolas Maduro on Saturday, who was wanted on federal charges of narco-terrorism, drug traf...

item.title: Don’t Sell Out Pro-Lifers to Save Obamacare
item.description: Being ‘flexible on Hyde’ could mean voting for a grave evil — facilitating the unjust taking of human lives.

item.title: China’s Mineral Monopoly Is America’s Achilles’ Heel
item.description: Until the U.S. is no longer dependent on critical minerals from China, the country will use its advantage as a cudgel against us.

item.title: Want to End Shutdowns? Remember the Past and Proceed with Caution
item.description: After last year’s government shutdown, it’s not surprising to see a number of proposals to prevent future shutdowns.

item.title: The U.S. Military Command Plan Needs a Reboot
item.description: The Pentagon’s structural overhaul ought to be matched with the coordination needed to successfully wage large-scale war anywhere.

item.title: Don’t Follow the False Sirens of International Law
item.description: An overly formalistic view of international rules not only hurts America and its allies, but it also creates a more lawless world.

item.title: Trump says Venezuela will only buy U.S. products with new oil money
item.description: President Trump says Venezuela will use proceeds from its U.S.-guided oil production to buy American products.

item.title: Dems Hate Trump More Than An Actual Dictator
item.description: The hypocrisy of Democrats is as thick as Caracas flies. And their claims that Maduro's arrest violated U.S .and international law are wrong.
